name: [Portuguese] Freedom
description: I spoke to my colleagues (HCI Coffee) at 26/05/2020 about freedom. What is freedom? How good is it? What happens if we get rid of it? How do different design systems deal with freedom (or lack of it)? I compare Tailwind CSS to Material Design and Apple HCI guidelines, and then I explore how we can apply "lack of freedom" into presentations. How can we make better slides by limiting ourselves into what we can do? And how do most tech companies use these concepts in their favour?
